commentable_entity.ask: Remove cyberbully Michele Dauber from Twitter and fired from Standford University
commentable_entity.title: Remove cyberbully Michele Dauber from Twitter and fired from Standford University
commentable_entity.description: Mrs. Michele Dauber is a Professor at Stanford and an Amber Heard supporter. It's nothing wrong in being someones supporter but it's definitely wrong in cyberbully  and shaming a MALE VICTIM of domestic abused, Johnny Depp, on social media. It's affecting everyone included young generations seeing how a PRESTIGIOUS Professor is acting on social media and what kind of behavior is setting as an example for us. Mrs. Michele Dauber should be fired from Stanford University and have her Twitter account suspended for instigating others in posting slurs about Johnny Depp abuse. This should be set as an example that even people as her can be dangerous for our society.

comment:
Although this woman is a tenured professor her behaviour is deplorable. No one should be protected, or feel like they are protected, by a tenureship & be allowed to continue with obvious hate crimes against a proven innocent man & private citizens whom simply do not agree with her views on a social media platform.
This woman is the exact stereotype of someone whom believes the world begins & ends on Social Media an inflated ego & superior personality complex. She is the complete opposite of what she claims to be as she attacks females (yet says she a woman who advocates for other women under the deplorable #metoo & #timesup movement) calling them side pieces these are women whom are at the top of the career game.

As the saying goes "those who can't do, teach" this woman should not be teaching any future law graduates nonetheless should she ever practice in law at all
